articles.author: Ian King
articles.title: Arm Shares Slip After Chip Designer Gives Tepid Annual Forecast - Bloomberg
articles.description: Arm Holdings Plc shares tumbled after the chip designer gave a lukewarm revenue forecast for the fiscal year, raising concerns that the tech industry’s artificial intelligence spending spree is slowing.

articles.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank plans to hire 400 engineers to ramp up tech transition - The Economic Times
